Breadth-First.Explanation: The model explores different descriptor terms (‘Radcliffe Square area’, ‘University College precinct’, ‘Central Oxford’) without a fixed hypothesis, gathering options broadly.

Depth-First.Explanation: With a specific hypothesis that the location is Logic Lane, the model lists detailed image clues to verify it.
Depth-First.KeyElement: Sign reads ‘LOGIC LANE’; building masonry; lane description; covered bridge

Depth-First.Explanation: The model converges to confirm the hypothesis by summarizing all evidence that points to the identified location.
Depth-First.KeyElement: All evidence points to the lane within University College

Depth-First.Explanation: The model finalizes and confirms the precise location conclusion based on the verified evidence.
Depth-First.KeyElement: Location Conclusion: Logic Lane, University College, Central Oxford

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: After exploring naming options broadly, the model adopts a specific hypothesis (‘Logic Lane’) and shifts to detailed verification analysis.
